title: 46a00 - Purpose.
text:
The H-2B provisions of the Immigration and
Nationality Act (INA) provide for the admission of nonimmigrants to the United
States to perform temporary non-agricultural labor or services. See 8 USC §
1101(a)(15)(H)(ii)(b). This chapter provides information on regulations and
interpretations with respect to the Wage and Hour Division’s (WHD) enforcement authority
under the H-2B nonimmigrant program.
html: The H-2B provisions of the Immigration and Nationality Act (INA) provide for the admission of nonimmigrants to the United States to perform temporary non-agricultural labor or services. See 8 USC § 1101(a)(15)(H)(ii)(b). This chapter provides information on regulations and interpretations with respect to the Wage and Hour Division’s (WHD) enforcement authority under the H-2B nonimmigrant program.
